smartgov.urban.osm.agent

Class OsmAgentBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.core.agent.core.AgentBody<MoverAction>
      • smartgov.core.agent.moving.MovingAgentBody
        • smartgov.urban.geo.agent.GeoAgentBody
          • smartgov.urban.osm.agent.OsmAgentBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeliveryDriver

    public class OsmAgentBody
extends GeoAgentBody
    An OSM implementation of a GeoAgentBody. This agent can move between OsmNodes on OsmArcs using the CarMover. It senses data from the environment using a smartgov.urban.osm.agent.perception.CarDriverSensor.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class smartgov.urban.geo.agent.GeoAgentBody
